com.martinandersson.javaee.arquillian.clientserver

Class ClientServerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.martinandersson.javaee.arquillian.clientserver.ClientServerTest

  • public class ClientServerTest
extends Object
    This test will make a HTTP GET request from client to server.

    This class is a skeleton and demonstration of just how real a test can be. The client- and server code is executed in two different JVM:s.

    If you haven't already, read and study HelloWorldTest before reading through this file.

    Author:
    Martin Andersson (webmaster at martinandersson.com)
